title: Bug 116254AjTypeSystem interface cannot be used in LTW environment
description: Bug 116254AjTypeSystem interface cannot be used in LTW environment See bug 116229 for moredetails.
OB: This API uses unqualified calls to Class.forName().
EB: The attached patches better simulate a runtime environment and a fixthat uses the class loader associated with the type provided by the user.
